abstract: Returns a serializable property list that’s sufficient to identify the option within its group.
overview:
## Return Value

A serializable property list that you can use to obtain an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionOption] representing the same option as the receiver using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionGroup/mediaSelectionOption(withPropertyList:)].

## Discussion

You can serialize the returned property list using [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/PropertyListSerialization].

# propertyList()

**Instance Method**

Returns a serializable property list that’s sufficient to identify the option within its group.

## Declaration

```swift
func propertyList() -> Any
```

## Return Value

A serializable property list that you can use to obtain an instance of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionOption] representing the same option as the receiver using [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMediaSelectionGroup/mediaSelectionOption(withPropertyList:)].

## Discussion

You can serialize the returned property list using [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/PropertyListSerialization].
title: propertyList()
